subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: Every April, Errie Ball, 102, feels young again at the sight of the emerald fairways of Augusta National on his television screen. He is the last surviving competitor from the inaugural tournament.
snippet: Every April, Errie Ball, 102, feels young again at the sight of the emerald fairways of Augusta National on his television screen. He is the last surviving competitor from the inaugural tournament.
